moderation.title: {{action}} Notification!
moderation.desc: You have received a {{action}} in {{name}} for:
moderation.appeal: You can appeal your ban using this link:

what.title: What happened?
what.description: Something went wrong with this command.

wrong.title: Did I do something wrong?
wrong.description: Errors can happen for a number of reasons. It could be an issue with the permissions you gave me, the code that powers me, or a number of other possibilities.

fix.title: So what can I do to fix it?
fix.description: If you need assistance with this feature, please [join our support server](https://chat.nhcarrigan.com). Once there, give this ErrorID to the support team to investigate.
